SEARCH
Package meta1sd

Class IndexStorageBarrel

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
meta1sd.IndexStorageBarrel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, RMIIndexStorageBarrel
public class IndexStorageBarrel extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RMIIndexStorageBarrel
IndexStorageBarrel - Componente responsável por armazenar e indexar dados de sites web. Implementa a interface RMIIndexStorageBarrel para comunicação remota.
See Also:
